rule.test:
BEGIN
    FOR EACH pensionScheme IN bericht2.party.pension
        FOR EACH cohort IN pensionScheme.pension
            IF cohort.contributionAmount != 0 OR cohort.withdrawalAmount != 0 THEN
                calculatedNetAmount = cohort.contributionAmount - cohort.withdrawalAmount

                IF calculatedNetAmount != cohort.netAmount THEN
                    PRINT FT2001
                END IF
            END IF
        END FOR
    END FOR
END
rule.message: FT2001: Net amount mismatch in cohort with refKey: ' + cohort.refKey

rule.test:
BEGIN
    FOR EACH pensionScheme IN bericht2.party.pension
        FOR EACH cashflow IN pensionScheme.financialTransaction
            IF cashflow.contributionAmount != 0 OR cashflow.withdrawalAmount != 0 THEN
                calculatedNetAmount = cashflow.contributionAmount - cashflow.withdrawalAmount

                IF calculatedNetAmount != cashflow.netAmount THEN
                    PRINT 'FT2002: Net amount mismatch in cashflow with refKey: ' + pensionScheme.refKey
                END IF
            END IF
        END FOR
    END FOR
END
rule.message: FT2002: Net amount mismatch in cashflow under schema with refKey: ' + pensionScheme.refKey

rule.test:
BEGIN
    FOR EACH pensionScheme IN bericht2.party.pension
        totalContributionInCohorts = 0
        mismatchedCohortRefKeys = ''

        FOR EACH cohort IN pensionScheme.pension
            totalContributionInCohorts += cohort.contributionAmount
            IF cohort.contributionAmount > 0 THEN
                mismatchedCohortRefKeys += cohort.refKey + ', '
            END IF
        END FOR

        FOR EACH cashflow IN pensionScheme.financialTransaction
            IF cashflow.contributionAmount != totalContributionInCohorts THEN
                PRINT FT2003
            END IF
        END FOR
    END FOR
END
rule.message: FT2003: Contribution amount mismatch in cashflow with Schema refKey: + pensionScheme.refKey + '. Mismatched Cohort RefKeys: ' + mismatchedCohortRefKeys

rule.test:
BEGIN
    FOR EACH pensionScheme IN bericht2.party.pension
        totalWithdrawalInCohorts = 0
        mismatchedCohortRefKeysWithdrawal = ''

        FOR EACH cohort IN pensionScheme.pension
            totalWithdrawalInCohorts += cohort.withdrawalAmount

            IF cohort.withdrawalAmount > 0 THEN
                mismatchedCohortRefKeysWithdrawal += cohort.refKey + ' '
            END IF
        END FOR

        FOR EACH cashflow IN pensionScheme.financialTransaction
            IF cashflow.withdrawalAmount != totalWithdrawalInCohorts THEN
                PRINT 'FT2004: Withdrawal amount mismatch in cashflow with refKey: ' + pensionScheme.refKey +
                      '. Mismatched Cohort RefKeys: ' + mismatchedCohortRefKeysWithdrawal
            END IF
        END FOR
    END FOR
END
rule.message: FT2004: Withdrawal amount mismatch in cashflow with Schema refKey: + pensionScheme.refKey + '. Mismatched Cohort RefKeys: ' + mismatchedCohortRefKeysWithdrawal

rule.test:
BEGIN
    FOR EACH pensionScheme IN bericht2.party.pension
        totalNetAmountInCohorts = 0
        mismatchedCohortRefKeysNet = ''

        FOR EACH cohort IN pensionScheme.pension
            totalNetAmountInCohorts += cohort.netAmount

            IF cohort.netAmount != (cohort.contributionAmount - cohort.withdrawalAmount) THEN
                mismatchedCohortRefKeysNet += cohort.refKey + ' '
            END IF
        END FOR

        FOR EACH cashflow IN pensionScheme.financialTransaction
            IF cashflow.netAmount != totalNetAmountInCohorts THEN
                PRINT 'FT2005: Net amount mismatch in cashflow with refKey: ' + pensionScheme.refKey +
                      '. Mismatched Cohort RefKeys: ' + mismatchedCohortRefKeysNet
            END IF
        END FOR
    END FOR
END
rule.message: FT2005: Net amount mismatch in cashflow with schema refKey:  + pensionScheme.refKey + '. Mismatched Cohort RefKeys: ' + mismatchedCohortRefKeysNet
